subject.description: Young woman with a bold, high-fashion edgy look
subject.hair: Shoulder-length, wet-look texture, platinum grey/silver color, swept back loosely with strands falling near the face
subject.face: Defined jawline, Fair skin tone, sultry expression
subject.makeup: Heavy dramatic smoky eye makeup with black eyeliner, contoured cheeks, matte nude lips with defined lipliner

styling.clothing: Black leather strapless corset top with a plunging sweetheart neckline and visible stitching details
accessories: Multiple silver ear piercings including hoops and studs on the left ear

pose.body_position: Medium shot from the chest up, slightly angled
pose.head_position: Head tilted back slightly with chin up
pose.gaze: Looking down at the camera with a confident, piercing gaze (bedroom eyes)

environment.elements: Circular spotlight projection on the wall behind the subject, creating a vignetted effect

lighting.effects: High contrast, distinct sharp shadow cast by the subject on the red background to the left, highlights on the collarbone, shoulders, and forehead

mood.atmosphere: Sultry, intense, cinematic, edgy, confident, rock-chic aesthetic

technical_specs.quality: Ultra-detailed skin texture, realistic lighting falloff, sharp focus on eyes, hyper-realistic
